description:
My apartment is walking distance to the United Nations Plaza, Grand Central Oyster Bar, Shake Shack, Chrysler Building, great restaurants. You’ll love my cozy apartment because of convenient mid-town Manhattan . My apartment is good for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.

Great 600 Sq Ft alcove spacious studio with great light, open windows facing north. A lot of sun light. Convenient to many subways (10 -12 minute walk to the 6 and the E) and buses and walking distance to many main attractions.

Washer/dryer in the basement

If you need anything, you can email and I will do my best to help you.

Very close to public transportation - bus and E/F/ 4/5/6 subway
name: Mid-town Manhattan (East Side near UN)
review: The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
